#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=OLALLA
#Text=' Now , ' said the doctor , ' my part is done , and , I may say , with some vanity , well done .
#Text=It remains only to get you out of this cold and poisonous city , and to give you two months of a pure air and an easy conscience .
#Text=The last is your affair .
#Text=To the first I think I can help you .

#Text=It fells indeed rather oddly ; it was but the other day the Padre came in from the country ; and as he and I are old friends , although of contrary professions , he applied to me in a matter of distress among some of his parishioners .

#Text=This was a family -- but you are ignorant of Spain , and even the names of our grandees are hardly known to you ; suffice it , then , that they were once great people , and are now fallen to the brink of destitution .
#Text=Nothing now belongs to them but the residencia , and certain leagues of desert mountain , in the greater part of which not even a goat could support life .
#Text=But the house is a fine old place , and stands at a great height among the hills , and most salubriously ; and I had no sooner heard my friend 's tale , than I remembered you .
#Text=I told him I had a wounded officer , wounded in the good cause , who was now able to make a change ; and I proposed that his friends should take you for a lodger .
#Text=Instantly the Padre 's face grew dark , as I had maliciously foreseen it would .
#Text=It was out of the question , he said .
#Text=Then let them starve , said I , for I have no sympathy with tatterdemalion pride .

#Text=There-upon we separated , not very content with one another ; but yesterday , to my wonder , the Padre returned and made a submission : the difficulty , he said , he had found upon enquiry to be less than he had feared ; or , in other words , these proud people had put their pride in their pocket .
#Text=I closed with the offer ; and , subject to your approval , I have taken rooms for you in the residencia .
#Text=The air of these mountains will renew your blood ; and the quiet in which you will there live is worth all the medicines in the world . '
#Text=' Doctor , ' said I , ' you have been throughout my good angel , and your advice is a command .
#Text=But tell me , if you please , something of the family with which I am to reside . '
#Text=' I am coming to that , ' replied my friend ; ' and , indeed , there is a difficulty in the way .

#Text=These beggars are , as I have said , of very high descent and swollen with the most baseless vanity ; they have lived for some generations in a growing isolation , drawing away , on either hand , from the rich who had now become too high for them , and from the poor , whom they still regarded as too low ; and even to-day , when poverty forces them to unfasten their door to a guest , they cannot do so without a most ungracious stipulation .
#Text=You are to remain , they say , a stranger ; they will give you attendance , but they refuse from the first the idea of the smallest intimacy . '
#Text=I will not deny that I was piqued , and perhaps the feeling strengthened my desire to go , for I was confident that I could break down that barrier if I desired .
#Text=' There is nothing offensive in such a stipulation , ' said I ; ' and I even sympathise with the feeling that inspired it . '

#Text=' It is true they have never seen you , ' returned the doctor politely ; ' and if they knew you were the handsomest and the most pleasant man that ever came from England ( where I am told that handsome men are common , but pleasant ones not so much so ) , they would doubtless make you welcome with a better grace .
#Text=But since you take the thing so well , it matters not .
#Text=To me , indeed , it seems discourteous .
#Text=But you will find yourself the gainer .
#Text=The family will not much tempt you .

#Text=A mother , a son , and a daughter ; an old woman said to be halfwitted , a country lout , and a country girl , who stands very high with her confessor , and is , therefore , ' chuckled the physician , ' most likely plain ; there is not much in that to attract the fancy of a dashing officer . '
#Text=' And yet you say they are high-born , ' I objected .
#Text=' Well , as to that , I should distinguish , ' returned the doctor .
#Text=' The mother is ; not so the children .
#Text=The mother was the last representative of a princely stock , degenerate both in parts and fortune .
#Text=Her father was not only poor , he was mad : and the girl ran wild about the residencia till his death .

#Text=Then , much of the fortune having died with him , and the family being quite extinct , the girl ran wilder than ever , until at last she married , Heaven knows whom , a muleteer some say , others a smuggler ; while there are some who uphold there was no marriage at all , and that Felipe and Olalla are bastards .

#Text=The union , such as it was , was tragically dissolved some years ago ; but they live in such seclusion , and the country at that time was in so much disorder , that the precise manner of the man 's end is known only to the priest -- if even to him . '
#Text=' I begin to think I shall have strange experiences , ' said I.
